title: Who is the ugliest K-pop group? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.2NE1  2NE1 were called the the ugliest girlgroup ever formed. Blackpink were called the prettier version of 2ne1, just imagine how disrespectful that is for both 2ne1 and blackpink. Now you might think what is wrong with them. The answer is nothing. The only problem present was terrible eyesight of yg entertainment and the people who bashed them. Now let's see the members individually: SANDARA PARK She is the literal definition of godess. She is the prettiest k pop idol yg entertainment ever had and you can't convince me otherwise. If you think she is ugly please contact the nearest mental hospital.    CL Not only is she gorgeous she is also the rap goddess. She has been breaking Korean stereotypes for quite a while but being the trash yg is they kept her in dungeon. Thankfully she left yg and fans (including me) are looking forward for her solo activities.  MINZY One of the best female dancers k pop ever had. Many people didn't found her pretty but personally I find her beautiful.   BOM First of all let's take a moment to appreciate her honey sweet voice. Now coming on to her visuals. She was pretty predebut as well as when she debuted with 2ne1  But yg told her that she is ugly and forced her to get plastic surgery which ended up ruining her face and now haters call her plastic surgery monster. I am still a fan of her voice and will definitely keep supporting her.  2. Piggy dolls   Piggy dolls were a girlgroup formed with overweight members breaking Korean standards. But they were so severely body shamed that they ended up dieting and losing weight. Here are all of the members individually:    So at the end I will say no one is ugly. Beauty is subjective and if you don't like something at least respect it. There is no need to shout your hate across internet because we certainly don't want to see it. Here are the link to articles in case anyone wants to know more: Yang Hyun-Suk's Criticisms Of His Female Idols' Appearance Resurface Following His Resignation Here's What Happened To Piggy Dolls, The Group That Encouraged Body Positivity Before It Was Cool Thanks for reading everyone 💚💚

DO NOT COMMENT BEFORE READING THE ENTIRETY OF THIS ANSWER. — Here’s the thing: Rather than saying “everyone is beautiful” I feel like we need to say, "ℕ𝕆𝕋 𝕖𝕧𝕖𝕣𝕪𝕠𝕟𝕖 𝕚𝕤 𝕓𝕖𝕒𝕦𝕥𝕚𝕗𝕦𝕝, 𝕒𝕟𝕕 𝕥𝕙𝕒𝕥’𝕤 𝕠𝕜𝕒𝕪." Because let’s be real. There are people who are good looking. And they are people who aren’t anywhere near good looking. It’s reality. But does it matter? No. What matters is the inside. And yes, 𝑒𝓋𝑒𝓇𝓎𝑜𝓃𝑒 𝒾𝓈 𝒷𝑒𝒶𝓊𝓉𝒾𝒻𝓊𝓁 𝒾𝓃 𝓉𝒽𝑒𝒾𝓇 𝑜𝓌𝓃 𝓌𝒶𝓎. Because there are many factors that make up beauty, not just the outside, not just superficial things. Everyone has their own charms and beauty, in their looks, in their skills, in their personality. Yes, there are people who I find to be unattractive or have lower than average visuals. But do I care? Do I hate on them or call them ugly? Hell no. They’re still great human beings and talented and skilled and hard-working and kind. By teaching that not everyone is super good looking and that’s perfectly fine, there’s less importance placed on how someone looks. Does that make sense? Anyways.        So let’s keep that in mind, and now I’m going to give you a list of idols that I don’t think are that attractive. Not necessarily answer the question as I don’t agree with how it is phrased. Note that, I do not agree with how the question is phrased. I don’t like the word “ugly” in itself, it’s repulsive and like saying someone is just not pretty. I would never say “ugly”, these are just some idols that I wouldn’t consider to have the best visuals. They’re all still beautiful in their own way and I am not hating on anyone shaming anyone or bringing anyone down. All of them are amazing, talented, hard-working, and strong women with beautiful souls. - 2NE1’s Park Bom  IZ*ONE’s Chaeyeon  ITZY’s Chaeryoung  Momoland’s JooE  . …Just kidding! Park Bom Laugh and eye smile: 12/10 Chae Sisters Sweet smile and elf-fairy vibe: 11/10 JooE Mochi/dumpling cheeks and eyes: 13/10 — Byee, have a nice day! ⭐️ ~FIN. P.S I edited this answer because I realized it could be slightly insulting/offensive or upsetting to some people. P.P.S Hey you, yeah you, Read the disclaimer!!
